summary: WHILE DRIVING AROUND A SLIGHT CURVE AT ABOUT 35 MPH, CONSUMER LOSS CONTROL OFF THE VEHICLE AND HIT A TREE.  CONSUMER NOTICED SMOKE COMING FROM UNDER HOOD, AND EXITED THE CAR. THE VEHICLE CAUGHT FIRE AND COMPLETELY BURNED.  CONSUMER FEELS VEHICLE SHOULD NOT HAVE BURNED SO SEVERELY.  PLEASE PROVIDE ANY FURTHER INFORMATION.   PH
